Title: Generate XSS Cookie Theft

Characters: Maddie, the hacker; Charlie, the victim; Alex, the system administrator
Location: Maddie's house

Maddie is a confident and experienced hacker who has been tinkering with web applications and networks for years. She has also amassed a collection of knowledge on different vulnerabilities in web-based applications, enabling her to bypass security measures with ease.

As luck would have it, Alex is Charlie's IT manager, and Charlie has little experience in cybersecurity. It's not long before Charlie discovers that Alex's system can detect Maddie as a zero-day
